title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4106.5 - Identification of horses
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4106.5 - Identification of horses

State Regulations

No horse shall be permitted to race that has not been
registered and tattooed and/or freeze branded in a manner approved by the
commission. Before each start such horse's tattoo, or freeze brand number shall
be read and verified and, if thereafter tested pursuant to section
4120.1
of this Subchapter, such
number shall again be read and verified. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4106.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
